list.abs: use underscores between words and are English plurals .在单词之间使用下划线,而且是英文复数。
Takeda said following the panel decision that the company underscored its position Actos offers a proven safety profile .武田公司表示理解顾问团的决定，公司强调了其立场，艾可拓的安全性方面业经证实。
underpunch 低位穿孔underscore character 下划线字符undetected error rate 漏检错误率
Constants should always be all - uppercase , with underscores to separate words ., 常量是应始终全大写 , 用下划线分开的词.

entry.def: If something such as an action or an event underscores another, it draws attention to the other thing and emphasizes its importance.

example.ex: The Labor Department figures underscore the shaky state of the economic recovery...
example.tran: 劳工部的数据进一步印证了经济复苏状况的不稳定。

example.ex: The rash of accidental shootings underscores how difficult it will be to restore order here.
example.tran: 一连串的意外枪击事件凸显了恢复该地区的秩序有多困难。

entry.def: If you underscore something such as a word or a sentence, you draw a line underneath it in order to make people notice it or give it extra importance.

example.ex: He heavily underscored his note to Shelley.
example.tran: 他在给谢利的便条内容下面重重地画了线。

means.word_mean: 1. a line drawn underneath (especially under written matter)
2. draw a line or lines underneath to call attention to

auth_sentence.content: The testimony was meant to underscore Sim's sacrifice.
auth_sentence.res_content: The testimony was meant to underscore Sim's sacrifice.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The testimony was meant to underscore Sim's sacrifice.

auth_sentence.content: Yes, it is the latest--underscore the latest.
auth_sentence.res_content: Yes, it is the latest--underscore the latest.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yes, it is the latest--underscore the latest.

auth_sentence.content: Democratic officials often underscore Biden's working-class origins.
auth_sentence.res_content: Democratic officials often underscore Biden's working-class origins.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Democratic officials often underscore Biden's working-class origins.
